text: These [be] the words [strongs id="h1697" /] which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto all Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] on this side [strongs id="h5676" /] Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /] in the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /], in the plain [strongs id="h6160" /] over against [strongs id="h4136" /] the Red [strongs id="h5489" /] [sea], between Paran [strongs id="h6290" /], and Tophel [strongs id="h8603" /], and Laban [strongs id="h3837" /], and Hazeroth [strongs id="h2698" /], and Dizahab [strongs id="h1774" /].

([There are] eleven [strongs id="h259" /] [strongs id="h6240" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /]’ [journey] from Horeb [strongs id="h2722" /] by the way [strongs id="h1870" /] of mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Seir [strongs id="h8165" /] unto Kadeshbarnea [strongs id="h6947" /].)

And it came to pass in the fortieth [strongs id="h705" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /], in the eleventh [strongs id="h6249" /] [strongs id="h6240" /] month [strongs id="h2320" /], on the first [strongs id="h259" /] [day] of the month [strongs id="h2320" /], [that] Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], according unto all that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] had given him in commandment [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] unto them;

After [strongs id="h310" /] he had slain [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8687" /] Sihon [strongs id="h5511" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /], which dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in Heshbon [strongs id="h2809" /], and Og [strongs id="h5747" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Bashan [strongs id="h1316" /], which dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] at Astaroth [strongs id="h6252" /] in Edrei [strongs id="h154" /]:

On this side [strongs id="h5676" /] Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /], in the land [strongs id="h776" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /], began [strongs id="h2974" tvm="8689" /] Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] to declare [strongs id="h874" tvm="8763" /] this law [strongs id="h8451" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] our God [strongs id="h430" /] spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto us in Horeb [strongs id="h2722" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], Ye have dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] long enough [strongs id="h7227" /] in this mount [strongs id="h2022" /]:

Turn [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8798" /] you, and take your journey [strongs id="h5265" tvm="8798" /], and go [strongs id="h935" tvm="8798" /] to the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /], and unto all [the places] nigh [strongs id="h7934" /] thereunto, in the plain [strongs id="h6160" /], in the hills [strongs id="h2022" /], and in the vale [strongs id="h8219" /], and in the south [strongs id="h5045" /], and by the sea [strongs id="h3220" /] side [strongs id="h2348" /], to the land [strongs id="h776" /] of the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /], and unto Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /], unto the great [strongs id="h1419" /] river [strongs id="h5104" /], the river [strongs id="h5104" /] Euphrates [strongs id="h6578" /].

Behold [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8798" /], I have set [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] you: go [strongs id="h935" tvm="8798" /] in and possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8798" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /] which the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] sware [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8738" /] unto your fathers [strongs id="h1" /], Abraham [strongs id="h85" /], Isaac [strongs id="h3327" /], and Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], to give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] unto them and to their seed [strongs id="h2233" /] after [strongs id="h310" /] them.

And I spake [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto you at that time [strongs id="h6256" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], I am not able [strongs id="h3201" tvm="8799" /] to bear [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8800" /] you myself alone [strongs id="h905" /]:

The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /] hath multiplied [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8689" /] you, and, behold, ye [are] this day [strongs id="h3117" /] as the stars [strongs id="h3556" /] of heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] for multitude [strongs id="h7230" /].

(The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h430" /] of your fathers [strongs id="h1" /] make you a thousand [strongs id="h505" /] times [strongs id="h6471" /] so many more as [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] ye [are], and bless [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8762" /] you, as he hath promised [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] you!)

How [strongs id="h349" /] can I myself alone bear [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] your cumbrance [strongs id="h2960" /], and your burden [strongs id="h4853" /], and your strife [strongs id="h7379" /]?

Take [strongs id="h3051" tvm="8798" /] you wise [strongs id="h2450" /] men [strongs id="h582" /], and understanding [strongs id="h995" tvm="8737" /], and known [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8803" /] among your tribes [strongs id="h7626" /], and I will make [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] them rulers [strongs id="h7218" /] over you.

And ye answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] me, and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], The thing [strongs id="h1697" /] which thou hast spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] [is] good [strongs id="h2896" /] [for us] to do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /].

So I took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] the chief [strongs id="h7218" /] of your tribes [strongs id="h7626" /], wise [strongs id="h2450" /] men [strongs id="h582" /], and known [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8803" /], and made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] them heads [strongs id="h7218" /] over you, captains [strongs id="h8269" /] over thousands [strongs id="h505" /], and captains [strongs id="h8269" /] over hundreds [strongs id="h3967" /], and captains [strongs id="h8269" /] over fifties [strongs id="h2572" /], and captains [strongs id="h8269" /] over tens [strongs id="h6235" /], and officers [strongs id="h7860" tvm="8802" /] among your tribes [strongs id="h7626" /].

And I charged [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8762" /] your judges [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8802" /] at that time [strongs id="h6256" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8800" /] [the causes] between your brethren [strongs id="h251" /], and judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8804" /] righteously [strongs id="h6664" /] between [every] man [strongs id="h376" /] and his brother [strongs id="h251" /], and the stranger [strongs id="h1616" /] [that is] with him.

Ye shall not respect [strongs id="h5234" tvm="8686" /] persons [strongs id="h6440" /] in judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]; [but] ye shall hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] the small [strongs id="h6996" /] as well as the great [strongs id="h1419" /]; ye shall not be afraid [strongs id="h1481" tvm="8799" /] of the face [strongs id="h6440" /] of man [strongs id="h376" /]; for the judgment [strongs id="h4941" /] [is] God’s [strongs id="h430" /]: and the cause [strongs id="h1697" /] that is too hard [strongs id="h7185" tvm="8799" /] for you, bring [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] [it] unto me, and I will hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] it.
And I commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8762" /] you at that time [strongs id="h6256" /] all the things [strongs id="h1697" /] which ye should do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /].

And when we departed [strongs id="h5265" tvm="8799" /] from Horeb [strongs id="h2722" /], we went through [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] all that great [strongs id="h1419" /] and terrible [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8737" /] wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /], which ye saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] by the way [strongs id="h1870" /] of the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /], as the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] our God [strongs id="h430" /] commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] us; and we came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] to Kadeshbarnea [strongs id="h6947" /].

And I said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto you, Ye are come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] unto the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /], which the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] our God [strongs id="h430" /] doth give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8802" /] unto us.

Behold [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8798" /], the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] thy God [strongs id="h430" /] hath set [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] thee: go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8798" /] [and] possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8798" /] [it], as the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h430" /] of thy fathers [strongs id="h1" /] hath said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto thee; fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] not, neither be discouraged [strongs id="h2865" tvm="8735" /].

And ye came near [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8799" /] unto me every one of you, and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], We will send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] men [strongs id="h582" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] us, and they shall search us out [strongs id="h2658" tvm="8799" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /], and bring [strongs id="h7725" /] us word [strongs id="h1697" /] again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] by what way [strongs id="h1870" /] we must go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /], and into what cities [strongs id="h5892" /] we shall come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /].

And the saying [strongs id="h1697" /] pleased me well [strongs id="h3190" tvm="8799" /] [strongs id="h5869" /]: and I took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] twelve [strongs id="h8147" /] [strongs id="h6240" /] men [strongs id="h582" /] of you, one [strongs id="h259" /] of a tribe [strongs id="h376" /] [strongs id="h7626" /]:

And they turned [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8799" /] and went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] into the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] unto the valley [strongs id="h5158" /] of Eshcol [strongs id="h812" /], and searched it out [strongs id="h7270" tvm="8762" /].

And they took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] of the fruit [strongs id="h6529" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /] in their hands [strongs id="h3027" /], and brought [it] down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8686" /] unto us, and brought [strongs id="h7725" /] us word [strongs id="h1697" /] again [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /], and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], [It is] a good [strongs id="h2896" /] land [strongs id="h776" /] which the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] our God [strongs id="h430" /] doth give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8802" /] us.

Notwithstanding ye would [strongs id="h14" tvm="8804" /] not go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8800" /], but rebelled [strongs id="h4784" tvm="8686" /] against the commandment [strongs id="h6310" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h430" /]:

And ye murmured [strongs id="h7279" tvm="8735" /] in your tents [strongs id="h168" /], and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], Because the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hated [strongs id="h8135" /] us, he hath brought us forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8689" /] out of the land [strongs id="h776" /] of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], to deliver [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] us into the hand [strongs id="h3027" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /], to destroy [strongs id="h8045" tvm="8687" /] us.

Whither shall we go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8802" /]? our brethren [strongs id="h251" /] have discouraged [strongs id="h4549" tvm="8689" /] our heart [strongs id="h3824" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], The people [strongs id="h5971" /] [is] greater [strongs id="h1419" /] and taller [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8802" /] than we; the cities [strongs id="h5892" /] [are] great [strongs id="h1419" /] and walled up [strongs id="h1219" tvm="8803" /] to heaven [strongs id="h8064" /]; and moreover we have seen [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] the sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of the Anakims [strongs id="h6062" /] there.
Then I said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto you, Dread [strongs id="h6206" tvm="8799" /] not, neither be afraid [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] of them.

And in the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /], where thou hast seen [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] how that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] thy God [strongs id="h430" /] bare [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /] thee, as a man [strongs id="h376" /] doth bear [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] his son [strongs id="h1121" /], in all the way [strongs id="h1870" /] that ye went [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /], until ye came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8800" /] into this place [strongs id="h4725" /].

Also the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] was angry [strongs id="h599" tvm="8694" /] with me for your sakes [strongs id="h1558" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], Thou also shalt not go [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] in thither [strongs id="h8033" /].

But [as for] you, turn [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8798" /] you, and take your journey [strongs id="h5265" tvm="8798" /] into the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /] by the way [strongs id="h1870" /] of the Red [strongs id="h5488" /] sea [strongs id="h3220" /].
